req.name: searchQuery
req.description: The creator ID or identifier used to filter the total count of invoices.

200.description: The total count of invoices matching the search criteria.

404.description: An error occurred while attempting to count the invoices.

req.name: id
req.description: The ID of the invoice to delete

200.description: Successful retrieval of a paginated list of clients

404.description: Not Found - error occurred during processing

req.name: body
req.description: Profile object that needs to be created

400.description: Bad Request - User already exists or passwords do not match

email.description: The email address of the user who forgot their password

200.description: Success message indicating an email has been sent

422.description: Error message when the user is not found in the database

error.example: User does not exist in our database

password.description: The new password to be set for the user account.

token.description: The password reset token received by the user via email.

req.name: id
req.description: The unique identifier of the profile

_id.description: The unique identifier of the profile

name.description: The name associated with the profile

email.description: The unique email address of the profile

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the profile

contactAddress.description: The contact address of the profile

logo.description: A URL or base64 string for the profile logo

website.description: The website URL of the profile

userId.description: An array of user identifiers associated with the profile

__v.description: The version key for Mongoose internal use

404.description: Profile not found or invalid ID provided

message.description: Error message explaining why the profile was not found

req.name: searchQuery
req.description: The identifier of the creator to filter invoices

req.name: searchQuery
req.description: The user ID used to filter clients.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of clients associated with the user.

404.description: Not Found - An error occurred while retrieving clients.
Client not found or invalid ID

200.description: The client was updated successfully and the updated client object is returned.

404.description: No client found with the provided ID or the ID is invalid.
